description: This Dart source file implements an in-memory data source for a fleet management system, providing seeded data for vehicles, groups, and maintenance events. It implements the DataSource interface and allows CRUD operations for these entities, facilitating development before integrating persistent storage like SQLite.
external_methods: DataSource interface methods: initialize, getVehicles, createVehicle, updateVehicle, deleteVehicle, getGroups, createGroup, updateGroup, deleteGroup, getEvents, createEvent, updateEvent, deleteEvent

classes.name: MemoryDataSource
classes.description: A simple in-memory data source with seeded data for vehicles, groups, and maintenance events, used for development purposes.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Populates the in-memory lists with seed data for groups, vehicles, and events if they are empty.

methods.name: getVehicles
methods.description: Returns an unmodifiable list of all vehicles.

methods.name: createVehicle
methods.description: Adds a new vehicle to the list and returns it.

methods.name: updateVehicle
methods.description: Updates an existing vehicle by ID.

methods.name: getGroups
methods.description: Returns an unmodifiable list of all groups.

methods.name: createGroup
methods.description: Adds a new group and returns it.

methods.name: updateGroup
methods.description: Updates an existing group by ID.

methods.name: getEvents
methods.description: Returns an unmodifiable list of all maintenance events.

methods.name: createEvent
methods.description: Adds a new event and returns it.

methods.name: updateEvent
methods.description: Updates an existing event by ID.
